description.en: Chinese political figure, current Director of the Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国环境保护部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国环境保护部
en: Ministry of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，是福建省生态环境厅的业务上级机构。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, and the professional superior of the Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 福建省人民政府组成部门

zh-cn: 福建省人民政府组成部门
en: Component Department of Fujian Provincial People's Government

description.zh-cn: 福建省人民政府的职能部门分类。
description.en: A classification for the functional departments of the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间福建省的权力机构。
description.en: The organ of power in Fujian Province during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 福建省环境保护领导小组

zh-cn: 福建省环境保护领导小组

description.zh-cn: 福建省生态环境厅的前身之一，成立于1975年。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment, established in 1975.

nodes.id: 福建省环境保护领导小组办公室

zh-cn: 福建省环境保护领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 福建省环境保护领导小组的办事机构，后改称福建省环境保护局。
description.en: The administrative office of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Leading Group, later renamed the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 福建省政府机构，曾管理福建省的环境保护部门。
description.en: A Fujian provincial government agency that once managed the province's environmental protection departments.

description.zh-cn: 福建省生态环境厅的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment.

nodes.id: 福建省城乡建设环境保护厅

zh-cn: 福建省城乡建设环境保护厅

description.zh-cn: 福建省政府机构，曾短暂合并福建省环境保护局。
description.en: A Fujian provincial government agency that briefly merged with the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau.

nodes.id: 福建省人民政府办公厅

zh-cn: 福建省人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 福建省人民政府的综合办事机构。
description.en: The general administrative office of the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 福建省生态环境厅的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of the Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment.

nodes.id: 福建省省级机构改革实施方案

zh-cn: 福建省省级机构改革实施方案

description.zh-cn: 一份由福建省委办公厅、省政府办公厅于2018年印发的文件，规定了省级机构的改革。
description.en: A document issued in 2018 by the General Offices of the Fujian Provincial Party Committee and Provincial Government, stipulating provincial institutional reforms.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任福建省环境保护领导小组组长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former head of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Leading Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任福建省环境保护领导小组办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former Director of the Office of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Leading Group.

description.en: Chinese political figure, former Director of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau.

description.en: Chinese political figure, former Director of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau.

description.en: Chinese political figure, former Director of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任福建省环境保护局局长和福建省环境保护厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former Director of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau and the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任福建省环境保护厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former Director of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Department.

description.en: Chinese political figure, former Director of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任福建省生态环境厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former Director of the Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国环境保护部

description.zh-cn: 福建省生态环境厅受中华人民共和国环境保护部的业务指导。
description.en: The Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment receives professional guidance from the Ministry of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 福建省生态环境厅是福建省人民政府的组织下级机构。
description.en: The Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment is an organizational subordinate of the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 福建省人民政府组成部门

description.zh-cn: 福建省生态环境厅是福建省人民政府组成部门之一。
description.en: The Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment is one of the component departments of the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 福建省环境保护领导小组

description.zh-cn: 1975年6月，福建省革命委员会成立了福建省环境保护领导小组。
description.en: In June 1975, the Fujian Provincial Revolutionary Committee established the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Leading Group.

relationships.source: 福建省环境保护领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 福建省环境保护领导小组办公室挂靠福建省建设委员会。
description.en: The Office of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Leading Group was affiliated with the Fujian Provincial Construction Committee.

relationships.source: 福建省环境保护领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 1980年4月，福建省环境保护领导小组办公室改称为福建省环境保护局。
description.en: In April 1980, the Office of the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Leading Group was renamed the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau.

relationships.source: 福建省城乡建设环境保护厅

description.zh-cn: 1983年6月，福建省环境保护局并入福建省城乡建设环境保护厅。
description.en: In June 1983, the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau was merged into the Fujian Provincial Department of Urban-Rural Construction and Environmental Protection.

description.zh-cn: 1984年7月恢复设立后，福建省环境保护局归口福建省建设委员会管理。
description.en: After its re-establishment in July 1984, the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau was under the administration of the Fujian Provincial Construction Committee.

relationships.target: 福建省人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 1991年2月起，福建省环境保护局改由福建省人民政府办公厅管理。
description.en: Starting from February 1991, the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau was managed by the General Office of the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 2009年8月，福建省环境保护局升格为福建省环境保护厅。
description.en: In August 2009, the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau was upgraded to the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Department.

relationships.source: 福建省省级机构改革实施方案

description.zh-cn: 该方案决定组建福建省生态环境厅。
description.en: This plan decided to establish the Fujian Provincial Department of Ecology and Environment.

relationships.source: 福建省省级机构改革实施方案

description.zh-cn: 该方案决定不再保留福建省环境保护厅。
description.en: This plan decided to no longer retain the Fujian Provincial Environmental Protection Department.

relationships.target: 福建省环境保护领导小组
福建省环境保护领导小组办公室
